about_the_game:
[Stand-Alone : Ep.0] is an experimental game where we are simultaneously releasing two different games, with [Stand-Alone : Ep.0] being an independent prequel story.
It contains the following core elements:

1. Small and interesting bugs we discovered by chance during the development of the main biography.

They may also be uninteresting


Usually, these are not critical bugs; you can avoid them in various ways, and some bugs might even make you stronger.
Of course, these bugs will only appear in [Stand-Alone : Ep.0], and if they prove to be interesting enough, we might keep these harmless elements in [Stand-Alone : Ep.0].



2. Hidden standalone content that had to be tearfully removed for the sake of a well-designed main storyline.

It’s not that we didn’t want to keep it


You can experience some special fragment dialogues and plot in [Stand-Alone : Ep.0], uncovering stories that are not shown in the main storyline.
The fragmented stories in [Stand-Alone : Ep.0] may change over time, but you’ll get some interesting clues.
If you truly love our game, whether you’re an interesting player or an influential streamer, your story might appear in [Stand-Alone : Ep.0].



3. Some experimental new systems and levels that might not be implemented in the main storyline but will appear here.

They might be implemented


This is exciting because you’ll experience our creative content ahead of time. They might not be stable or balanced, but they will always offer new surprises.
The [Stand-Alone] series is a game with long-term updates, but we will provide the latest test content and genres in [Stand-Alone : Ep.0] for players to experience first, and even incorporate player designs.



4. Collecting design ideas for anthropomorphized animals.

It’s both possible and necessary


Who doesn’t like cute sheep? We encourage any creative ideas and suggestions based on the main character, the little sheep.
We have gathered many ideas from players around the world who are enthusiastic about this, and we decided to support these ideas. You can discuss your thoughts, showcase your designs, or submit them to us via social media and groups.



5. Regularly holding interesting online test events.

Yes, you’re invited



As an action Rogue-Lite game, it has a wide fan base and is perfect for showcasing your impressive battle videos online.
[Stand-Alone : Ep.0] will provide you with a constant stream of creative ideas and continually updated test content. Please keep an eye on our announcements and contact us through any possible means.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
EP.0 Testing Recruitment Open

[Stand-Alone : Ep.0] is a prequel-style game, a pixel action RogueLite currently in the early stages of development. Please note that the main storyline of [Stand-Alone : Ep.0] is also being developed concurrently.

Given the open style of [Stand-Alone : Ep.0], we aim to communicate with Chinese players in a friendly and whimsical manner. We hope to create this atmosphere with no intention of causing offense; the game itself is still produced with a professional and meticulous approach. If you have any thoughts, please let us know.

Please refer to the announcement for recruitment rules.
